snippet: After decades in which smoking by people with mental illness was supported and even encouraged, a move in Louisiana reflects a broader effort to reverse course.
abstract: Change in Louisiana law will ban smoking in state's remaining psychiatric hospitals; shift removes tool that mental health professionals have used for decades as incentives or rewards for patients, and reflects growing effort by federal, state and other health officials to reverse course.
lead_paragraph: After decades in which smoking by people with mental illness was supported and even encouraged, a move in Louisiana reflects a broader effort to reverse course.
